00007 // use this header as a workaround for missing <limits>
00008 
00009 //  See http://www.boost.org/libs/utility/limits.html for documentation.
00010 
00011 #ifndef BOOST_LIMITS
00012 #define BOOST_LIMITS
00013 
00014 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00015 
00016 #ifdef BOOST_NO_LIMITS
00017 # include <boost/detail/limits.hpp>
00018 #else
00019 # include <limits>
00020 #endif
00021 
00022 #if (defined(BOOST_HAS_LONG_LONG) && defined(BOOST_NO_LONG_LONG_NUMERIC_LIMITS)) \
00023       || (defined(BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64) && defined(BOOST_NO_MS_INT64_NUMERIC_LIMITS))
00024 // Add missing specializations for numeric_limits:
00025 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64
00026 #  define BOOST_LLT __int64
00027 #else
00028 #  define BOOST_LLT long long
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 namespace std
00032 {
00033   template<>
00034   class numeric_limits<BOOST_LLT> 
00035   {
00036    public:
00037 
00038       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_specialized = true);
00039 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64
00040       static BOOST_LLT min(){ return 0x8000000000000000i64; }
00041       static BOOST_LLT max(){ return 0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFi64; }
00042 #elif defined(LLONG_MAX)
00043       static BOOST_LLT min(){ return LLONG_MIN; }
00044       static BOOST_LLT max(){ return LLONG_MAX; }
00045 #elif defined(LONGLONG_MAX)
00046       static BOOST_LLT min(){ return LONGLONG_MIN; }
00047       static BOOST_LLT max(){ return LONGLONG_MAX; }
00048 #else
00049       static BOOST_LLT min(){ return 1LL << (sizeof(BOOST_LLT) * CHAR_BIT - 1); }
00050       static BOOST_LLT max(){ return ~min(); }
00051 #endif
00052       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, digits = sizeof(BOOST_LLT) * CHAR_BIT -1);
00053       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, digits10 = (CHAR_BIT * sizeof (BOOST_LLT) - 1) * 301L / 1000);
00054       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_signed = true);
00055       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_integer = true);
00056       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_exact = true);
00057       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, radix = 2);
00058       static BOOST_LLT epsilon() throw() { return 0; };
00059       static BOOST_LLT round_error() throw() { return 0; };
00060 
00061       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, min_exponent = 0);
00062       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, min_exponent10 = 0);
00063       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, max_exponent = 0);
00064       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, max_exponent10 = 0);
00065 
00066       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_infinity = false);
00067       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_quiet_NaN = false);
00068       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_signaling_NaN = false);
00069       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_denorm = false);
00070       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_denorm_loss = false);
00071       static BOOST_LLT infinity() throw() { return 0; };
00072       static BOOST_LLT quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; };
00073       static BOOST_LLT signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; };
00074       static BOOST_LLT denorm_min() throw() { return 0; };
00075 
00076       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_iec559 = false);
00077       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_bounded = false);
00078       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_modulo = false);
00079 
00080       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, traps = false);
00081       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, tinyness_before = false);
00082       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(float_round_style, round_style = round_toward_zero);
00083       
00084   };
00085 
00086   template<>
00087   class numeric_limits<unsigned BOOST_LLT> 
00088   {
00089    public:
00090 
00091       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_specialized = true);
00092 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_MS_INT64
00093       static unsigned BOOST_LLT min(){ return 0ui64; }
00094       static unsigned BOOST_LLT max(){ return 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFui64; }
00095 #elif defined(ULLONG_MAX) && defined(ULLONG_MIN)
00096       static unsigned BOOST_LLT min(){ return ULLONG_MIN; }
00097       static unsigned BOOST_LLT max(){ return ULLONG_MAX; }
00098 #elif defined(ULONGLONG_MAX) && defined(ULONGLONG_MIN)
00099       static unsigned BOOST_LLT min(){ return ULONGLONG_MIN; }
00100       static unsigned BOOST_LLT max(){ return ULONGLONG_MAX; }
00101 #else
00102       static unsigned BOOST_LLT min(){ return 0uLL; }
00103       static unsigned BOOST_LLT max(){ return ~0uLL; }
00104 #endif
00105       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, digits = sizeof(BOOST_LLT) * CHAR_BIT);
00106       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, digits10 = (CHAR_BIT * sizeof (BOOST_LLT)) * 301L / 1000);
00107       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_signed = false);
00108       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_integer = true);
00109       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_exact = true);
00110       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, radix = 2);
00111       static unsigned BOOST_LLT epsilon() throw() { return 0; };
00112       static unsigned BOOST_LLT round_error() throw() { return 0; };
00113 
00114       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, min_exponent = 0);
00115       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, min_exponent10 = 0);
00116       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, max_exponent = 0);
00117       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, max_exponent10 = 0);
00118 
00119       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_infinity = false);
00120       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_quiet_NaN = false);
00121       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_signaling_NaN = false);
00122       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_denorm = false);
00123       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_denorm_loss = false);
00124       static unsigned BOOST_LLT infinity() throw() { return 0; };
00125       static unsigned BOOST_LLT quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; };
00126       static unsigned BOOST_LLT signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; };
00127       static unsigned BOOST_LLT denorm_min() throw() { return 0; };
00128 
00129       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_iec559 = false);
00130       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_bounded = false);
00131       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, is_modulo = false);
00132 
00133       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, traps = false);
00134       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, tinyness_before = false);
00135       BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(float_round_style, round_style = round_toward_zero);
00136       
00137   };
00138 }
00139 #endif
